definition: A field of study that involves the collection, analysis, interpretation, and presentation of numerical data, often used to describe and understand various aspects of society, economics, science, and other areas. It encompasses the methods and techniques used to gather data, as well as the mathematical and statistical models employed to analyze and draw conclusions from the data. It is commonly utilized in research, decision-making processes, policy development, and academic studies.
